Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Electrophoretic analysis of plasma BChE of the proband and his mother showed that patient has a reduced amount of tetrameric enzyme in plasma and that minor fast - moving BChE components : monomer , dimer , and monomer - albumin conjugate are missing .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| reduced amount of tetrameric enzyme in plasma |
| missing minor fast - moving BChE components: |
| - monomer |
| - dimer |
| - monomer - albumin conjugate |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Here are the valid entities that refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| reduced amount of tetrameric enzyme in plasma |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "minor fast - moving BChE components" and "monomer - albumin conjugate," do not clearly refer to a disease and are not included in the table.
